Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards

Interface EffectHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameModelExpert
public interface EffectHandler
Handler for the effect of the character cards.

    • tryGiveProfsToCurrPlayer

      EnumMap<StudentColor,Integer> tryGiveProfsToCurrPlayer()
      Moves the professors to the current player if it has the same number of student in the hall of the current owner.
      Returns:
      map of the professors moves and their original owner's player index.

    • tryRemoveStudentsFromHalls

      void tryRemoveStudentsFromHalls(StudentColor s, int idealAmount)
      Tries to remove the ideal amount of students from the hall of all players and puts them back in the bag. If there aren't enough students, removes only the available ones.
      Parameters:
      s - student color of student to remove.
      idealAmount - ideal amount of student to remove from halls.

    • getSkippedStudentColors
